shinypak

The primary goal of shinypak is to provide easy access to the applications in moviesApp, the example application for the Shiny App-Packages book.

shinypak also has functions for checking the files and folders in a Shiny app-package.

Installation

You can install the development version of shinypak from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mjfrigaard/shinypak")
library(shinypak)

Git/GitHub configuration

shinypak uses the gert package for Git/GitHub management (and assumes authentication was done automatically using the credentials package).1

Available app-packages

The example applications are stored in the branches of the moviesApp repo. To see a list of the available app-packages, use list_apps()2

list_apps()

Launching apps and app-packages

Launch an application from any section in the book using:

launch(app = "02.3_proj-app")
